title: Night Class in Your Field
flavor: You sign up for a night course that promises to sharpen your core skills.

title: Online Masterclass Binge
flavor: You buy a big-name masterclass and consider whether to actually watch it.
choiceB_label: Let it play in the background

title: Local Contest Submission
flavor: A local zine, fest, or journal announces a deadline that’s way too soon.
choiceA_label: Polish and submit your best work

title: Industry Conference Pass
flavor: Your friend has a spare badge for a small industry conference.

title: Work-Sponsored Training
flavor: Your day job offers to pay for a skills workshop “if it helps the company.”
choiceA_label: Tailor it to your art too

title: Mentor Coffee Chat
flavor: A more experienced artist agrees to meet and talk shop.
choiceA_label: Ask hard questions about your path

title: Residency Application
flavor: You find a residency program that sounds unreal… and very competitive.

title: Collaborative Project Invite
flavor: A friend invites you to collaborate on something ambitious and weird.
choiceA_label: Say yes and split the work
choiceB_label: Decline and focus on solo work

title: Portfolio Review Night
flavor: A local org offers quick portfolio reviews with industry folks.

title: Skill-Share Meetup
flavor: Everyone brings one skill to teach and one to learn.

title: Grant Writing Session
flavor: A workshop walks you through the maze of grants and applications.

title: Weekend Intensive
flavor: An intense weekend bootcamp promises a leap forward if you survive it.
choiceB_label: Drop in for a single session
